title: Waitress
body:
What are you doing here?
<<if !visited("Waitress.GivePie")>>
    [[Waitress.GivePie]]
<<else>>
    <<if !visited("Peter.TakePie")>>
        I can see you still have the pie.
        Go make yourself useful!
        At least you didn't eat it so far.
    <<else>>
        I'm going to give you the benefit of the doubt,
        and assume you didn't eat the pie.
        That means you probably brought it to someone.
        Good job, you might be useful after all.
    <<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: Waitress.GivePie
body:
I've never seen your face,
and we really don't need strangers around.
But if you're here you might as well be helpful.
Take this pie and give it to a local who deserves it.
But if you eat it yourself I swear I will find you.
